Writing Value Packs Free Shipping In Stock Clearance Deal Centre Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx]]> Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx]]> Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx]]> View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111
Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special-order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. Offer valid while supplies last. Minimum purchase is required after other discounts and before tax. Purchase $200 of qualifying Post-It® Teamwork Tools (BN11-C, 6845SSPL, 6445SSP, 654-24SSCP-C, 654-24MIA-CP-C, 654R-24CP-AP, 654-5SSW-C, 654-5SSNP-C, 654-5SSBE-C, 654-5SSCR-C, 654-5SSY-C, 654-5SSLE-C, 654-5SSNO-C, 654-5SSSC-C, 810R-1833, 810-12BX-CA, 183DM-2-ESF, 680HVBE, 680HVRD, 680HVYW, ABS-330-B, ABS-330-W) and receive a free Post-It® Mini Easel Pad (577SS). Enter promo code 202001FE at checkout. Retail Value: $19.68. Limit one redemption per account. One time use only. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. Offer expires January 31, 2020 /5:00pm ET. © 2020 Grand & Toy Limited ${customBodyHtml1}
